description: Devold® Running Outer Layer consists of a wind resistant cover, vest, pants, skirt and shorts - which can be worn alone, over tights or together with Devold® Running calves and sleeves. The new innovation Devold® Running Cover will protect you against wind and allow you to extend the running season to the whole year. They are lightweight and breathable garments, and the cover has a two-way zipper that ensures good ventilation if you start to overheat. Smart panels under the arms and on the back provide high airflow. The form-fitting collar, wind-resistant sleeves and core provide extra protection, making it the perfect workout wear for all seasons. - Thin front layer that protects against wind and weather.
name: Devold Running Merino Cover Zip Neck - Mens
